001package com.github.sormuras.bach.workflow;
002
003import com.github.sormuras.bach.Bach;
004import com.github.sormuras.bach.Command;
005import com.github.sormuras.bach.Project;
006import com.github.sormuras.bach.command.Composer;
007import com.github.sormuras.bach.command.DefaultCommand;
008import com.github.sormuras.bach.project.ProjectSpace;
009
010/** A workflow-running builder of projects. */
011public record WorkflowRunner(Bach bach, Project project) {
012
013  public void grabExternals() {
014    run(new GrabExternalsWorkflow(bach, project));
015  }
016
017  public void compileSpaces() {
018    for (var space : project.spaces()) runCompileWorkflow(space);
019  }
020
021  public void executeTests() {
022    var testSpace = project.spaces().find("test");
023    testSpace.ifPresent(this::runExecuteTestsWorkflow);
024  }
025
026  public void launchModule(String module, Object... arguments) {
027    var space = project.spaces().values().get(0);
028    runLaunchModuleWorkflow(space, module, command -> command.addAll(arguments));
029  }
030
031  public void run(Workflow... workflows) {
032    for (var workflow : workflows) workflow.run();
033  }
034
035  public void runCompileWorkflow(ProjectSpace space) {
036    run(new CompileWorkflow(bach, project, space));
037  }
038
039  public void runExecuteTestsWorkflow(ProjectSpace space) {
040    run(new ExecuteTestsWorkflow(bach, project, space));
041  }
042
043  public void runLaunchModuleWorkflow(
044      ProjectSpace space, String module, Composer<DefaultCommand> composer) {
045    var command = composer.apply(Command.of(module));
046    run(new LaunchModuleWorkflow(bach, project, space, command));
047  }
048}
